question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. c. National Front (FN)
raw_output:
I have a somewhat unfavorable opinion of the National Front because I recognize its controversial history and associations with far-right politics, but I also acknowledge that some of its policies might appeal to certain voters. Based on this understanding, I would select a middle-ground option. 

ANSWER: C
